region=chr18:34318506-34318509

samtools mpileup test_data/WT_Soma_Ctrl2_Apc.bam -r $region | \
	awk '{ delete freq; for (i=1; i<=length($5); i++) {char=substr($5,i,1); if (char ~ /[ATGCatgc]/) freq[char]++}; printf $1 FS $2 FS $3 FS $4; for(j in freq) { printf FS j ":" freq[j] } printf "\n"}'
